channel.title: Rstats Jsonfeed on JSONBecker
channel.description: Recent content in Rstats Jsonfeed on JSONBecker

item.title: Announcing jsonfeedr, a new R package
item.description: I have not yet spent the time to figure out how to generate a JSON feed in Hugo yet. But I have built an R package to play with JSON feeds. It’s called jsonfeedr, and it’s silly simple. Maybe I’ll extend this in the future. I hope people will submit PRs to expand it. For now, I was inspired by all the talk about why JSON feed even exists. Working with JSON is fun and easy.
